main.description: Specification of a kind of resource. Could define a material item, service, digital item, currency account, etc.

name.description: An informal or formal textual identifier for a type of resource

image.description: The URI to an image relevant to the entity

resourceClassifiedAs.description: References concepts in a common taxonomy for categorization

defaultUnitOfResource.description: Reference to the default Unit used for the resource itself

defaultUnitOfEffort.description: Reference to the default Unit used for use or work

substitutable.description: Defines if any resource of that type can be freely substituted for any other
